activities: Reveal hosts and processes electronic files on behalf of clients and their legal counsel. We may provide any of the following services: data collection, data processing, data conversion, data loading, data hosting, data production. The data may contain personal information of our clients' employees, partners or any other third party with which our clients may have data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: offline, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech:
BBB EU Safe Harbor, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus, for unresolved disputes that do not concern human resources data:  www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor  

The European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for unresolved disputes that do concern human resources data.
